creditline: Gift of Rev. Richard L. Hillstrom
text:
Born and educated in Sweden, Sandzén emigrated to the United States at the age of 23.  He settled in Lindsborg, Kansas, where he held a lifelong professorship at Bethany College. 

Sandzén's technique is marked by a rich, inventive, high-key colorism executed in a pointillist style. His work is inspired by the landscape of the western United States, from summers spent in Colorado, Utah, and New Mexico.
title: Evening
